### Ingest
#### country, year, number of tests


```{r, echo=FALSE}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/renewable-energy-investment/renewable-energy-investment.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```


### Wrangle
#### wide to long


```{r, echo=FALSE}

df_wrangle <- melt(df, id.vars=c("Year", "Global_total"))
df_wrangle

```


### Streamgraph
#### color by country


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1080/72, out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
  text = element_text(family = "inconsolata", color = "#ffffff"), 
  legend.position = "none",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text.x = element_text(family = "inconsolata", color = "#ffffff", size = 11), 
  axis.text.y = element_blank(),
  axis.line.y = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
  axis.title.y = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background=element_rect(fill="black", colour="black"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_rect(fill="black", colour="black"),
)

code_pal <- c("China" = "#D1206B", 
              "Europe" = "#FBAC00",
              "India" = "#FFA000",
              "Japan" = "#16F0CC",
              "US" = "#8598EE",
              "Rest_of_world" = "#ADF0E8"
              )

v1 <- ggplot(df_wrangle, aes(x = Year, y = value, group = variable, fill = variable, color = variable)) +
  stat_steamgraph() +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(min(df_wrangle$Year), max(df_wrangle$Year), 2)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = code_pal ) +
  scale_color_manual(values = code_pal ) +
  #coord_fixed( 0.2 * diff(range(df$Year)) / diff(range(df$N))) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme_opts +
  xlab(NULL) +
  ylab(NULL)

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 1280/72, height_svg = 720/72,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0))
)

```

### Streamgraph
#### with annotations

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1080/72, out.width="100%"}

v2 <- v1 + 
  coord_cartesian(clip="off") +
  annotate("text", x = 1962, y = 80, label = "Peak testing of nuclear\nweapons in 1962", hjust = "center", size = 3, fontface = 2) +
  annotate("text", x = 1998, y = 15, label = "Pakistan\nConducted 3 test in\n1998", hjust = "center", size = 3, fontface = 2) +
  annotate("text", x = 1998, y = -10, label = "India Conducted\n5 test in 1998", hjust = "center", size = 3, fontface = 2)

girafe(ggobj = v2, width_svg = 1280/72, height_svg = 720/72,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0))
)

```



```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-show'}

# eval = FALSE as default; run manually as chunk

# full version
ggsave(filename = "outputs/nuclear-weapons-tests-fs.svg", plot = v1, width=1280/72, height=720/72)

# thumbnail version without annotations
ggsave(filename = "outputs/nuclear-weapons-tests-sm.svg", plot = v1, width=4, height=2.25)

```
